Uses of Class
xxl.core.io.Buffer.Slot

  • Packages that use Buffer.Slot 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.io
    Provides classes and routines for system input and output through data streams, serialization, raw i/o and a FAT file system.

    • Uses of Buffer.Slot in xxl.core.io

      Subclasses of Buffer.Slot in xxl.core.io 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  LRUBuffer.Slot
      This class provides a single slot in a LRU buffer.
      Fields in xxl.core.io with type parameters of type Buffer.Slot 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Map<I,Buffer.Slot> Buffer.Slot.members
      A map that contains all slots that are owned by the owner of this slot.
      protected Map<O,Map<I,Buffer.Slot>> Buffer.owners
      A map that contains the owners and their slots in this buffer.
      protected List<Buffer.Slot> Buffer.slots
      An array containing all the slots of this buffer.
      Methods in xxl.core.io that return Buffer.Slot 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Buffer.Slot Buffer.fix(O owner, I id, Function<? super I,? extends E> obtain)
      Fixes the slot with the given id owned by the specified owner and returns it.
      protected Buffer.Slot Buffer.lookUp(O owner, I id)
      Returns the slot with the given id owned by the specified owner.
      protected Buffer.Slot LRUBuffer.newSlot(int index)
      Creates a new empty slot with the specified index.
      protected Buffer.Slot Buffer.newSlot(int index)
      Creates a new empty slot with the specified index.
      protected Buffer.Slot LRUBuffer.victim()
      Returns the next slot to displace in this LRU buffer.
      protected abstract Buffer.Slot Buffer.victim()
      Returns the next slot to displace in this buffer.
